Translations.Text: ane temana para temana karyoni kharabi spasta tha'i ga'i ane jeni maskari te'o kari rahya hata, te vastu'e te lokone gheravamam la'i lidha
ane kahi devamam avyum ke aje ame tamane bhuli ja'isum, jevi rite tame a divasani mulakatane bhuli gaya hata, tamarum thekanum jahannama che ane tamari madada karanara ko'i nathi

a etala mate ke tame allaha ta'alani ayatoni maskari kari hati ane duniyana jivane tamane dhokamam nankhi didha hata, basa! Ajana divase na to a lokone (jahannama) manthi kadhavamam avase ane na temanum karana yogya ganase
Basa! Allaha mate prasansa che, je akaso ane dharati tatha samagra srstino palanahara che
dareka pratistha, akaso ane dharatimam teni ja che ane te ja vijayi ane hikamatavalo che
a kitabanum avatarana allaha vijayi, hikamatavala taraphathi che

ame akasa, dharati ane te banneni vacce dareka vastu'one uttama yojana sathe ja eka nakki karela samaya sudhi taiyara kari che. Ane inkari'one je vastuni cetavani apavamam ave che (tenathi) modhum pheravi le che

tame kahi do! Ju'o to khara jene tame allahana sivaya pokaro cho, mane pana batavo ke te'o'e dharatino kevo tukado banavyo che, athava akasomam te'ono kevo bhaga che? Jo tame saca hoya to a pahelano ko'i grantha athava te jnana je nakala karavamam avatu hoya, mari pase la'i avo
ane tenathi vadhare pathabhrasta kona hase? Je allaha sivaya eva lokone pokare che je kayamata sudhi teni phariyada nahim sambhali sake, parantu te'ona pokaravathi a loko pana ajana che
